results.title: Deep venous thrombosis in an individual with statin-exposed anti-SRP myopathy: case report and review of literature
results.text_hl: After @DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathic@@@ management, discontinuation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, and anticoagulant treatment ultrasonography revealed only partial @DISEASE_Thrombosis @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombosis@@@ in left femoral @<m>DISEASE_Stenosis_Pulmonary_Vein</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071078 @@@vein@@@ (Fig. 2D).

citations.NLM: Li J, Yan M, Qin J, He L, Dai C, Wen R. Deep venous thrombosis in an individual with statin-exposed anti-SRP myopathy: case report and review of literature Thromb J. 2021 Nov 25;19(1):92. PMID: 34823539

results.title: Simvastatin exerts favourable effects on neointimal formation in a mouse model of vein graft.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ exerts favourable effects on @DISEASE_Neointima @DISEASE_MESH:D058426 @@@neointimal formation@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Stenosis_Pulmonary_Vein</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000071078 @@@vein@@@ graft.

citations.NLM: Zhang L, Lu H, Huang J, Guan Y, Sun H. Simvastatin exerts favourable effects on neointimal formation in a mouse model of vein graft. Eur J Vasc Endovasc Surg. 2011 Sep;42(3):393-9. PMID: 21693384
